body.name: ANTSIR 6 inch Male Action Figure Body - Complex Flexible PVC Material, 17 Articulated Joints, Ideal for Cosplay and Collectibles

features: Versatile Action Figure: Enjoy endless possibilities with this 1/12 scale male action figure body, perfect for various roles in movies, games, and more.
Durable Construction: Made from high-strength PVC material with reinforced steel joints, ensuring long-lasting durability and resistance to wear and tear.
Realistic Design: With its handsome facial features, muscular physique, and realistic muscle modeling, this figure offers a lifelike representation of the male form.
Fully Poseable: Featuring 17 points of articulation, including 360-degree rotation for the head, arms, and waist, allowing for a wide range of dynamic poses.
Complete Set: Includes compatible head sculpt, shoes, hand types, and a handgun, allowing you to create various complete poses without the need for additional accessories.
body.description: Introducing the AM116 1/12 Male Action Figure Body by ANTSIR. This highly versatile and affordable action figure body is designed to meet the needs of both new players and seasoned collectors. Crafted with meticulous attention to detail, this figure boasts handsome facial features, a muscular physique, and an elegant silhouette that exudes confidence. The body is made from high-strength PVC material, ensuring a lightweight yet durable construction. The muscle modeling is intricately painted, providing a lifelike appearance when the figure is displayed without clothing. The joints are reinforced with steel, offering exceptional mechanical strength, rigidity, and fatigue resistance, surpassing similar products in terms of longevity. With 17 points of articulation, including 360-degree rotation for the head, arms, and waist, this figure allows for a wide range of dynamic poses. From splits and high kicks to ground pounds and kneeling positions, you can effortlessly recreate classic actions from various characters. The body can also be disassembled, allowing for creative DIY combinations to cosplay different roles. The AM116 1/12 Male Action Figure Body comes complete with a compatible head sculpt, shoes, hand types, and a handgun, providing everything you need to create a variety of complete poses without the need for additional accessories. Whether you're a collector, cosplayer, or simply a fan of action figures, this figure is a must-have addition to your collection.TIP: How To Connect Body And Head/Feet 1. Take out the connector or height adjuster inside the head sculpture. 2. Put it in hot water for 2 minutes or heat it with a hair dryer for 2 minutes. 3. Put it into the head sculpture connector and gently press it on the neck.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.2 4.2 out of 5 stars 29 ratings 4.2 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great For Drawing
reviews.reviewText: I got this so I could get a better view on my body drawings and it was so worth it! Its easy to visualize now!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pose Him Slowly/Gently - He's a Bit Fragile (But You Can Pop Him Back Together When Needed!)
reviews.reviewText: Originally, we'd planned to repaint this guy or make him some clothes or something, but then life got in the way and he's still nude. But my dad seems to find that VERY amusing and loves to prank the rest of the family with the Naked Man action figure. It's not unusual to find Naked Man in the pantry, sobbing nudely in despair next to the canned fish...It's a pretty good figure, oddness aside! lol. He's VERY posable - almost as much as the Marvel Legends figures - which is awesome. But he's also very delicate and you need to put him into poses slowly, with a gentle hand, because his parts are prone to pop out. His chest dislodged itself from his abs just taking him out of his box!He comes with different hands, some extra neck pegs, a handgun, and a pair of shoes. I want to give him five stars, but they're asking for nearly $30 for Naked Man and that's a bit steep for what he is. The average for Marvel Legends figures is around $25 and those are fully painted and have clothes other than shoes lol.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fully articulated figure ideal for drawings
reviews.reviewText: A very well articulated male figure that can be put in an almost limitless number of poses. Interesting that the only provided accessories are boots and a gun, but works great as a starting point for accurately drawing the human body.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just a fun little guy!
reviews.reviewText: This has got to the be the most articulated action figure I've ever seen. Every single joint on him can move.And he even comes with replacement feet and hands!The figure has good tension in the internal stringing, so if you pose him, he can stand and hold pretty much any stance all by himself. I had a lot of fun making him do Tae Kwon Do forms and Arthurian knight poses.If you like to draw, it might be useful to have a muscled figurine like this to use as a small reference for the whole body.It should be noted however, that the joints on the hands are more fragile than they appear, and can be slightly chipped if you rotate them too roughly.I'd recommend this to younger adults and older collectors who like cool action figures and wanted a blank slate to customize.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nicely articulated and detailed
reviews.reviewText: This is a really good quality action figure. The articulation is really quite extensive, and allows you to position this into many different poses. I like that it comes with both bare feet and booted feet, as well as 3 different sets of hands, not to mention a pistol accessory. There is enough detail here that I can see this used as a better quality artist's mannequin for a drawing reference. It's also just a lot of fun. This one is even well enough made and articulated that as you see in my photos, it can stand on its own without support (clothing for reference; these are not included).For around $27, this is a good value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Movement, but parts fall off
reviews.reviewText: His joints are all very mobile and can achieve any pose, but he can’t really stand alone unsupported. His hands/feet/head all fall off easily. I wish the head had more detail, especially his blank eyes. I will probably add some details with markers. The skin tone is a bit too grey. His hair has some odd horizontal lines.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great articulation, lacking details
reviews.reviewText: This 6" action figure blank comes with a nice selection of extra hands, booted feet, and a small weapon. It scales nicely with other 1/12 scale figures and accessories. Figure is typically "buff" (nobody makes a "dad bod" action figure!), and is molded in a nice flesh colored PVC that is relatively accurate for a skin tone. I wish the head/face/hair had more paint detail, but in all honesty, I will probably just use the body and swap the head from another similar figure, though the head and face could be painted. For less than 30 bucks, it's a nice quality figure that could be used by artists for model drawing, kids for playing with other 6" figures and accessories, or toy collectors/photographers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This male action figure is great for practicing poses on, or using as a reference. He has a lot of articulation and snaps together easily. Like most action figures, his body is not terribly realistic unless you are body builder ready to enter a competition. He comes with shoes and a various hands. You can also change his height at the ankles by using smaller included pegs. Here we see Jean doing yoga as best he can. It's OK if you topple over Jean! Just begin again!
